trans-unit.source: Represents widths in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlSizeDefinition"></xref>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength"></xref> structure with an absolute value in pixels.
The absolute pixel value to initialize the length to.
pixels is .
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength"></xref> structure with the specified value and length unit.
The requested size of the element.
The type that is used to determine how the size of the element is calculated.
value is .
-or-
type is and value is or .
-or-
type is not , , , or .
Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength"></xref> structure that represents the standard automatic sizing mode.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength"></xref> structure that represents the standard automatic sizing mode.
Determines whether the specified object is equal to the current <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength"></xref>.
The object to compare to the current instance.

`true` if the specified object is a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength"></xref> with the same value and sizing mode as the current <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength"></xref>; otherwise, `false`.

Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength"></xref> is equal to the current <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength"></xref> to compare to the current instance.

`true` if the specified object is a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength"></xref> with the same value and sizing mode as the current <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength"></xref>; otherwise, `false`.
Gets a hash code for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength"></xref>.
A hash code for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength"></xref>.
Gets a value that indicates whether this instance sizes elements based on a fixed pixel or logical value.

`true` if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength.RibbonControlLengthUnitType"></xref> property is set to <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLengthUnitType.Pixel"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLengthUnitType.Item"></xref>; otherwise, `false`.
Gets a value that indicates whether this instance automatically sizes elements.

`true` if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength.RibbonControlLengthUnitType"></xref> property is set to <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLengthUnitType.Auto"></xref>; otherwise, `false`.
Gets a value that indicates whether this instance automatically sizes elements based on a weighted proportion of available space.

`true` if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength.RibbonControlLengthUnitType"></xref> property is set to <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLengthUnitType.Star"></xref>; otherwise, `false`.
Compares two <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength"></xref> structures for equality.
The first <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength"></xref> instance to compare.
The second <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength"></xref> instance to compare.
`true` if the two <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength"></xref> instances have the same value and sizing mode; otherwise, `false`.
Compares two <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength"></xref> structures to determine whether they are not equal.
The first <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength"></xref> instance to compare.
The second <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength"></xref> instance to compare.
`true` if the two <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength"></xref> instances do not have the same value or sizing mode; otherwise, `false`.
Gets the type that is used to determine how the size of the element is calculated.
One of the enumeration values that specifies how the size of the element is calculated.
Returns a string that represents the current object.
A string that represent the current object.
Gets the absolute value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength"></xref> in pixels or logical units.

The absolute value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength"></xref> in pixels or logical units, or 1.0 if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength.RibbonControlLengthUnitType"></xref> property is set to <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLengthUnitType.Auto"></xref>.
